issue.title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
@{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} - can you please confirm that all I have to do is publish `/robot_data` topic? Or it should be robot name \+ `/robot_data`? I just tried `unittest4`, image `200670743174.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/subt/robotika:unittest4` `44d25031-574a-4d4c-bce1-a97c84886c96` and in the log I can see only rosout:

‌

```
179.584000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:51(clockCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /robot_data] received Clock 0 
179.776000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:59(imuCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /robot_data] received Imu 0  
```

Or it should be `/X0F300R/robot_data`?
content.html:
@Nate Koenig - can you please confirm that all I have to do is publish /robot_data topic? Or it should be robot name + /robot_data? I just tried unittest4, image 200670743174.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/subt/robotika:unittest4 44d25031-574a-4d4c-bce1-a97c84886c96 and in the log I can see only rosout:

‌

179.584000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:51(clockCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /robot_data] received Clock 0 
179.776000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:59(imuCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /robot_data] received Imu 0

Or it should be /X0F300R/robot_data?
